data.actual_result: The Active on Mobile icon is too dark.
data.expected_result: The Active on Mobile icon should be brighter.
data.short_description: When a user has presence active, the Active on Mobile icon will appear too dark and it becomes potentially hard to see.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user who has some sort of presence activity (playing/listening) who also has the Active on Mobile icon next to their name. - Open their profile.
